name: Maze Game *ADVANCED*
description:
NOTE:-FIRST OF ALL THIS GAME MAY HAVE BUGS AND SO ITS STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT!! PLZ COMMENT IF U FIND MORE BUGS!!

Instructions-

Plz restart game if creator tool not working

WASD or Arrow keys to move mobile options available also. Change sound by dragging the sound bar in options, even If there are 4 levels but actually there are UNLIMITED LEVELS, YOU CAN CREATE you very own LEVELS! make levels by clicking level maker button then simple drag n drop of blocks. Change costume of player with arrow key in start menu! AND ur goal is to reach the green line GOOD LUCK!

----versions----

1.ov- Release of game!

1.2v-End line added

1.3v-Bug Fixes

1.5v-ADDED END LINE AS A CREATOR TOOL!

1.6v- Renamed CREATOR TOOLS for convnience of user! more bug fixes! automatic bug finder fixed!

1.7V-Bug fixes!

1.8v-If end line touched (creator tools) then new lvl has to be made cuz lvl generated gets finished and is of no use! :D plz dont be sad if lvl was ur hardest!

2.oV-HUGE BUG FIXES ON automatic bug finder and more!

2.1V-Bug fixes on block placing in creator tools.

2.2v-More Bug fixes on developer tools!

2.3v-More bug fixes on developer tools, now tools can be only placed in ratio of frame size!

2.4v-Bug fixes on Level editor

2.5v-Bug fix on creator tools
